column2: I wasn't impressed the first time I went there but wanted to give them another chance tonight. I'm sorry to say I was even more disappointed this time. I understand the name is Smoque but that doesn't mean everything has to be smothered in that taste. It was a cross between that and burnt flavored. I'm still trying to get the taste out of my mouth. The fries and brisket chili were decent
column3: the baby back ribs and chicken were not. This was definitely not worth $26.00. I wont be back.
